org.eng.aisp.feature.extractor.vector.util

Class TriangleFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.aisp.feature.extractor.vector.util.TriangleFilter

  • public class TriangleFilter
extends Object
    Support for Filter Bank computation. See http://practicalcryptography.com/miscellaneous/machine-learning/guide-mel-frequency-cepstral-coefficients-mfccs/

      • filter

        public static Signal2D filter(double[] data,
                              double samplesPerSecond,
                              double targetSamplingRate,
                              int numBands,
                              int minFreq,
                              int maxFreq,
                              double maxPeakToNoiseRation)
        Applies FFT extraction and triangular filter on the window's getData() value using the sampling rate for the 0th datum.
        Parameters:
        data -
        samplesPerSecond - the sampling rate of the given data.
        targetSamplingRate - the rate to re-sample the given data to. If 0, then use the default as defined by ExtendedFFT.
        numBands -
        minFreq -
        maxFreq -
        maxPeakToNoiseRation -
        Returns:
        a pair of arrays, each of length numBands.
